This game single handedly ruined my life, both past and present and future. Gambling simulator with the loot boxes keeps drawing you back in like a slot machine, it should be classified as gambling but the ESRB is too pussy to make any sort of changes because money. Every game I'm matched with down right terrible or trolls for teammates and I have no hope of ranking up even if I sweat try hard because of the way the MM works. I'd rather use the game as toilet paper, and that's as a LAST resort. TLDR: Go spend your money elsewhere, on a home, kids, family, not a slot machine.
Окалибруйтесь на две звезды, дойдите до 4 звезд, а через 3 года упадите на третьего сильвера без шансов вернуть хотя бы первую Голд Нову.Только в каэс.Незабываемые эмоции
